name: Dot Matrix Dodger
description:
In this fast-paced game, you're going to need to be on top of your wits as you use your phone's accelerometer to zip in and out of trouble with waves upon waves of enemies coming after you. Coupled with a crisp and clean visual style, lose yourself to the game, get in the zone, and be one with the circle.

How long can you survive?

-------

Only available for Android devices. Download the file here, or download on the Google Play store for any updated builds

Google Playstore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....

This game has Ads that you can turn on and off completely for free, but we appreciate you leaving them on!

Check us out on Facebook and Twitter!
